column4: guys, don't try to out-guess Ubuntu - just use the Ubuntu defaults - admit you are newbies and use what Ubuntu recommends!
There are other distros for you if you want more control: Fedora - Gentoo
If YOU are installing packages from the command line or -- gasp -- trying to compile the application yourself -- then you are using the WRONG DISTRO
just out of curiosity, what have you been drinking?
